subject: Science
goals: Understand the basic concepts of matter, including atoms, elements, compounds, and the states of matter.
milestones: Be able to describe the structure of matter and explain the different states of matter.

learning_tasks.task: Read textbook sections on "Structure of Matter" and "States of Matter"

practice_tasks.task: Complete worksheet on "States of Matter" and answer end-of-chapter questions

resources: Grade 9 Science textbook; Khan Academy videos on "States of Matter"; Worksheet on "States of Matter"
